title: [Health] New study suggests that the federal government should enact a national paid sick-leave law in the US. Furthermore, the study found that variation in state paid sick-leave laws, preemption, and lack of employer provision of paid sick leave to low-wage workers creates substantial inequities nationally

[Medicine] The brain's ability to clear a protein closely linked to Alzheimer's disease is tied to our circadian cycle, according to new research. The research underscores the importance of healthy sleep habits and opens a path to potential Alzheimer's therapies.
